Another small patch based on user feedback rebalancing research progression and adding learning helper tutorials. Additionally, a non-steam download link also now exists on GitHub.
|Patch Notes: * Added learning helper tutorials based on feedback. These skip lore unlike other descriptions and primary focus on usage in a simplified format. * Updated melee damage factor values in CE patches. * Updated Manifest.xml load rules for legacy users. * Updated README.txt to include licenses. * Lowered research project cost of central nervous cyberization, cyberbrain interfaces and the net by 200 each. * Extreme cyberization research project cost raised. * Closed Shell Syndrome rebalanced, focusing less on manipulation and more on learning/hacking ability. * Fixed Cyberbrain Sclerosis sometimes not progressing if certain disease overhaul mods are also loaded. * Fixed incorrect description of Cyberbrain Sclerosis.

Small patch that finally backports cyberbrain abilities to 1.4 and adds graphic variations to cyberbrains as items! Minor balance tweaks and EPOE-Forked patch changes also made.
|Patch Notes: * All cyberbrain abilities have been backported to 1.4 with Combat Extended support! * New graphic variations of the cyberbrain exist for the basic, enhanced, specialized and extreme variants to make them visually distinguishable as items. * Adjusted effects of OS40L Combat Network. * Updated loading screen tips, added another five new loading screen tips. * Texture path changes, please check this if you have written a texture patch for this mod! * Pain Dampen and Pain Nullify cyberbrain ability toggles now only have a 1 second delay (previously 80 seconds). * Pain Dampen ability now sets pain factor to 25% (was 20%). * Basic cyberbrain now has access to Pain Dampen ability. * Extreme cyberization now requires 3 days to adapt (previously 2). * Cyberbrain Sclerosis now takes 30 days to reach full severity (previously 60 days). * Minor fix to extreme cyberbrain adaptation phase stat changes. * EPOE-Forked patch now adds brain surgery research requirement for the cyberbrain installation surgery itself. * EPOE-Forked patch will now use MA-AI chips in all cyberbrain recipes. * EPOE-Forked patch to replace cyberbrain graphics has been removed due to addition of new cyberbrain graphics. If it is requested back, I will readd it.

Hotfix for incorrect values in some cyberbrains.
|Patch Notes: * Fixed some incorrect statFactors values in some Hediffs. * Fixed some incorrect statFactors values in Combat Extended patches. * Minor changes to About.xml file content.
